posts.title: Dragonslayer
posts.excerpt: A King has made a pact with a dragon where he sacrfices virgins to it, and the dragon leaves his kingdom alone. An old wizard, and his keen young apprentice volunteer to kill the dragon and attempt to save the next virgin in line, the King’s own daughter.

posts._title: Georges Lautner – Les tontons flingueurs AKA Monsieur Gangster AKA Crooks In Clover (1963)
posts.title: Les tontons flingueurs
posts.excerpt: In this action-packed slapstick comedy – a dying mob boss nicknamed “The Mexican” asks his old friend and ex-gangster, Fernand Naudin (Lino Ventura), to come out of retirement to take over the family businesses and protect his soon to be married daughter. The rival families take an exception to this and unleash their henchmen to …
posts.titleEnglish: Monsieur Gangster AKA Crooks In Clover

posts._title: Shûichi Okita – Kitsutsuki to ame AKA The Woodsman and the Rain (2011)
posts.title: Kitsutsuki to ame
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Rookie movie director Koichi and his crew travels to the mountain village of Yamamura to film his next movie. The villagers are eventually enlisted to help film the movie and, in particular, 60-year-old lumberjack Katsuhiko helps against his will.

posts._title: Benoît Jacquot – Les adieux à la reine AKA Farewell, My Queen (2012)
posts.title: Les adieux à la reine
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:In July 1789, the French Revolution is rumbling. Far from the turmoil, at the Château de Versailles, King Louis XVI, Queen Marie-Antoinette and their courtiers keep on living their usual carefree lives. But when the news of the storming of the Bastille reaches them, panic sets in and most of the aristocrats and their servants …

posts.title: The Constant Nymph
posts.excerpt: A married man leaves his wife for a teenage girl. The Constant Nymph is a 1933 British drama film directed by Basil Dean and Victoria Hopper, Brian Aherne and Leonora Corbett. It is an adaptation of the novel The Constant Nymph by Margaret Kennedy. Dean tried to persuade Novello to reprise his appearance from the …

posts.title: Transylvania
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Zingarina arrives in Transylavania, accompanied by her close friend Marie and her guide and interpreter Luminitsa. She is not there only to visit this region of Romania but to trace her lover Milan, a musician who has made her pregnant and who left her without a word of explanation. When she finds him back, he …

posts._title: Martin Fric – Capkovy povidky AKA Capek’s Tales (1947)
posts.title: Capkovy povidky
posts.excerpt: Martin Fric composed several Karel Capek’s Tales in the form of story telling of train passengers. They include three tales from the book “Tales from One Pocket”: “Propuštěný” (Released), “Poslední soud” (The Last Judgment) and “Ukradený spis” (The Stolen Document); and two tales from the book “Tales from the Other Pocket”: “Balada o Juraji Čupovi” …

posts._title: Ferzan Ozpetek – Saturno contro AKA Saturn in Opposition (2007)
posts.title: Saturno contro
posts.excerpt: The sympathetically drawn, unthreatening gay characters here are practically an advertisement for this hot political topic. Abroad, the film’s biggest selling point, as with “Steam: The Turkish Bath” and “Ignorant Fairies,” is its relaxed, modern approach to gay characters and lifestyle, unusual for an Italian film. The mix of straight and gay stories, though, should …

posts._title: Claude Nuridsany & Marie Pérennou – Microcosmos: Le peuple de l’herbe AKA Microcosmos (1996)
posts.title: Microcosmos: Le peuple de l’herbe
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:“A documentary of insect life in meadows and ponds, using incredible close-ups, slow motion, and time-lapse photography…” Review:Children, being built nearer to the ground and having more time on their hands, are close observers of ants and spiders, caterpillars and butterflies. Adults tune them out; bugs are things you slap, swat, step on or spray. …

posts._title: Ubaldo Ragona & Sidney Salkow – The Last Man on Earth (1964)  USA
posts.title: The Last Man on Earth (1964)  USA
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:When a plague devastated life on Earth, the population died or became a sort of zombie living in the dark. Dr. Robert Morgan is the unique healthy survivor on the planet, having a routine life for his own survival: he kills the night creatures along the day and maintains the safety of his house, to …
